definition[0]: a small sharp piece of wood, glass, or metal, that has broken off a larger piece
example[0]: Iâ€™ve got a splinter in my finger.
definition[1]: if something such as wood splinters, or if you splinter it, it breaks into thin sharp pieces
definition[2]: to separate into smaller groups or parts, or to make a group or organization do this, especially because of a disagreement
example[2]: The once-powerful Communist Party has splintered into hundreds of pieces.
